title: GG's 2023 Story of the Year: AI Rocks Gaming Industry
description: Gaming jobs dwindled in 2023 while more and more studios embraced generative AI tools—and gamers hate it. Here's what's on the horizon.

title: Understanding the risk of yield farming
description:
Yield farming, a concept born out of the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem, has recently gained popularity. Simply, it refers to deploying idle cryptocurrency assets to generate additional returns or rewards. This innovative approach allows investors and users to maximize profits by participating in various liquidity pools and yield farming protocols. The allure of yield farming […]

The post Understanding the risk of yield farming appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ripple’s CLO Reflects on His Firm’s Victory Over the U.S. SEC With Regard to Establishing XRP’s Status
description: In December 2020, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) initiated a significant lawsuit against Ripple Labs, including its executives Bradley Garlinghouse and Christian A. Larsen. The case, centered around allegations that Ripple conducted an unregistered securities offering through its sale of XRP, has been a focal point in the crypto industry, particularly concerning the […]

title: Immutable X Whitepaper: Transforming the NFT Marketplace
description: The latest edition of the Immutable X Whitepaper, released on June 26, 2023, version 1.2, dives deep into this pioneering Layer 2 scaling solution tailored for Ethereum NFTs. title: South Korean gaming company Wemade floats $100m web3 fund
description: Wemade, the South Korean video game developer, is launching a $100 million Web3 fund in collaboration with Singapore-based Whampoa Digital.

title: Swych Finance Releases the Next Generation of Decentralized Perpetual Exchanges
